data.title: 30 Portrait paintings of victor amadeus ii of sardinia, Ermine clothing in art Images: PICRYL
data.meta_description: Download Images of  - Free for commercial use, no attribution required. From: Charles Emmanuel II, Duke of Savoy with his son and wife Marie Jeanne of Savoy by an unknown artist, to Maria Giovanna Battista Clementi, La Clementina, Portrait of Victor Amadeus II of Savoy, during the siege of Turin (1706), Reggia di Venaria (from Castle of Racconigi). Find  images dated from 1600 to 2022.
data.meta_site_name: PICRYL - Public Domain Media Search Engine
data.text:
Charles Emmanuel II, Duke of Savoy with his son and wife Marie Jeanne ...

Victor Amadeus II of Savoy by Mytens, Royal Palace of Turin

Public domain photo of an Italian art painting, 16th-17th century, free to use, no copyright restrictions image - Picryl description.

Portrait of a King of Sardinia in gala dress - Racconigi

Portrait of Victor Amadeus II of Sardinia (1666-1732), misidentified with his son Charles Emmanuel III (1701-1773), wearing a white ermine cloak, lace sleeves, a chain with a medallion around his neck and with ... More

Portrait of a Knight of the Order of the Most Holy Annunciation

Portrait of a Knight of the Supreme Order of the Most Holy Annunciation (presumably Victor Amadeus II of Sardinia (1666-1732)) Français : Portrait de gentilhomme au bâton de commandement

Portrait of a man with the Orders of the Garter and the Thistle

Portrait of James Francis Edward Stuart (1688-1766) , with the British orders of the Garter and the Thistle, misidentified with Victor Amadeus II of Sardinia (1666-1732) or Victor Amadeus III of Sardinia (1726-1796).

Presumed portrait of Charles Emmanuel III of Savoy (so-called Victor A...

Portrait of Charles Emmanuel III of Sardinia (1701-1773), misidentified with his father Victor Amadeus II (1666-1732) Italiano: Ritratto di S.M. Re Vittorio Amedeo II di Savoia

Victor Amadeus II of Sardinia, oval - Royal Palace, Turin

So-called Portrait of Victor Amadeus II of Sardinia (1666-1732) The depicted character bears little resemblance to Victor Amadeus II, but instead has many similarities to a portrait of his son Victor Amadeus, ... More

Italiano: Re Vittorio Amedeo II di Savoia che nel 1728 a seguito della sua ascesa al trono ordina all'ing.Conte di Exelles, Ignazio Bertola da Roveda la progettazione e l'erezione di una nuova Cittadella in Al ... More

Portrait of a Prince of Sardinia in armour, oval

So-called portrait of Victor Amadeus II of Sardinia (1666-1732), but probably portrait of his son Charles Emmanuel III (1701-1773)

So-called portrait of Victor Amadeus II and Anne Marie d'Orléans

So-called portrait of Victor Amadeus II of Sardinia (1666-1732) and his wife Anne Marie d'Orléans (1669-1728) This painting is probably a depiction of Victor Amadeus I, Prince of Carignano (1690-1741) and Mari ... More
